t: How to research an unknown Amazon charge - Amazon Customer Service
s: Check unknown charges such as AMZNMktplace or amzn.co.uk/pmgb via your Amazon transaction history in Your Account > Your Payments > Transactions.

t: Unknown Charges on Prime Video - Amazon Customer Service
s: A Prime Video add-on subscription was renewed. If you signed up for a free trial of Amazon Prime and a separate Prime Video add-on subscription at the same time, please note that the monthly charges for both services may fall on different dates.

t: Multiple Charges for the Same Order - Amazon Customer Service
s: Orders may be split into multiple shipments or even multiple orders. Because we charge for items when they're shipped, it may result in multiple charges. However, the total amount charged should add up to the amount displayed when you placed the order.

t: How much does it cost to sell with Amazon?
